title: Mehdi Shiri (footballer, born 1991)
text: Mehdi Shiri (, born January 31, 1991 in <a href="Iran">Iran</a>) is an Iranian <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="winger%20%28association%20football%29">winger</a>, who currently plays for <a href="Persepolis%20F.C.">Persepolis</a> in the <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a>. After playing for <a href="Paykan%20F.C.">Peykan</a> in first half of <a href="2018%E2%80%9319%20Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">2018–19</a>, he joined to Persepolis and played in <a href="Right%20back">Right back</a>.
